title: Manage a Controlled Document
description: A process engineer has updated a Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) and needs to submit it for approval and release.

tasks.description: Check out the current version of the SOP from the document control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks out the document, locking it for editing.

tasks.description: Upload the new version of the SOP and provide a summary of the changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uploads the revised file and enters change control notes.

tasks.description: Submit the revised document into the approval workflow.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the document, and it is routed to the quality manager for review.
